title: free alistar bug
body: i subscribed to Riot Games and League of Legends but I didnt recieve a free ali skin and the champ :( rito plz

replies.body: Wolfess is exactly right!  Sounds like Alistar got lost after getting unchained.....Eh???  No worries, our support team can help you herd him by back by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!

send a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) and let them know that you're having trouble claiming your unchained alistar skin and would like help with it. 
Should have that fixed in a few minutes 
enjoy
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
